channel.title: Barrows Minigame not working?

item.title: Barrows Minigame not working?
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

I’ve recently improved my Barrows minigame, so you dig and go down into that place with the coffin.
After you kill, well, let’s say for example Guthan, it gives you guthan == 1, or ‘public int guthan = 1;’
So, if you try to search Guthan’s coffin again, you won’t be able to, because of

if(objectID == 6773){ if(guthan == 1) { sM("One Guthan at a time!"); } if (isSpawned == true) { sM("One Guthan at a time!"); } if (isSpawned == false && guthan == 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2027, 3540, 9705, heightLevel); isSpawned = true; } }

isSpawned is a boolean so you can’t spawn more then one Guthan.
After you kill Guthan, your Guthan int goes up to 1.
All the other coffins work on the same principle, just different int and boolean names.

This is when you search the chest:

if(objectID == 10284){ if(verac == 1 && dharok == 1 && ahrim == 1 && torag == 1 && karil == 1 && guthan == 1) { verac = 0; dharok = 0; ahrim = 0; torag = 0; karil = 0; guthan = 0; addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1); addItem(Item.randomRunes(),misc.random(200)); addItem(995, misc.random(5000)); sM("You search the chest and find some crap."); } else sM("As you attempt to open the chest, it somehow shuts on your fingers!"); }

I get no errors in the Compiler, but even if all those ints are 1, you only get “As you attempt to open the chest, it somehow shuts on your fingers!”

Does anybody know the problem?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 05:08:47 am[/size][hr]Come on, atleast somebody should know? =\

Read full topic
